feed.title: Hera Global Tech
feed.subtitle: Hera Global Tech is a biotechnology company with a focus on personal health and safety solutions using cutting edge sensors and machine learning technologies.

entry.title: FedEx Competition
entry.content: We are proud to be a participant in the FedEx Small Business Grant Contest. Vote for us below to help us provide #safetyforeveryone.
